rows.label: tlk43400012_06_msg0001
rows.name:
That damn Bahn! We never would
have thought he was targeting
Queen Lagert of all people...

rows.label: tlk43400012_06_msg0002
rows.name:
But I have to say, it's unexpected
that the Emperor of Superbia would
intervene to lend us a hand.

rows.label: tlk43400012_06_msg0003
rows.name:
I hear you offered us
your assistance too.

rows.label: tlk43400012_06_msg0005
rows.name:
Up until now, I'd been launching a
secret investigation into the actions
of the Nopon and of Superbia.

rows.label: tlk43400012_06_msg0006
rows.name:
But fighting a common enemy has defused
Invidian-Superbian tensions. For now,
I think my job here is done.
